plugins.microphonePermission: MyndLens needs the microphone to hear your voice mandates. Your audio is processed on-device and never stored.

plugins.contactsPermission: MyndLens uses your contacts to personalise your Digital Self and reduce how many questions it needs to ask you.

plugins.calendarPermission: MyndLens reads your calendar to learn your routines and working patterns for your Digital Self.
plugins.remindersPermission: MyndLens reads reminders to enrich your Digital Self.

infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: MyndLens uses your contacts to personalise your Digital Self and reduce how many questions it needs to ask you.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: MyndLens reads your calendar to learn your routines and working patterns for your Digital Self.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: MyndLens needs the microphone to hear your voice mandates. Your audio is processed on-device and never stored.
